general.gigTitle: design and develop a modern website for your business

sellerCard.description:
I'm an experienced software engineer with over +7 years of experience in web development and data analysis. I can find solutions to problems and handle things best and most optimally. I'm fluent in English and Persian and intermediate in French, and Arabic.
I am ready to do an excellent job for you.

description.content:
As a software engineer and experienced WordPress developer with more than +7 years of experience, I specialize in designing and developing stunning and modern websites tailored to meet your specific business needs. Whether you're a small business, a startup, or an established company, I can help you establish a strong online presence.


What I Offer:

  • Custom Modern Website Design
  • Responsive and Mobile-Friendly Layouts
  • Professional Business Website Development
  • E-commerce Solutions
  • SEO Optimization
  • Fast Loading Speed
  • User-Friendly Navigation
  • Integration with Social Media


Why Choose Me?

  • Over 5 years of experience in development and website design
  • Expertise in the latest web technologies and trends
  • Dedicated to delivering high-quality work on time
  • Excellent communication and support throughout the project

 

Let's get started on your project now! 

If you don't know which package you should choose, contact me. I will provide Free Consultation Services for you.


Explore my portfolio for examples of my work and relevant projects:

https://www.fiverr.com/users/mohammad_nazari/portfolio

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are you able to create WordPress website design exact same of the link provided?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can create the exact design of the sample or link provided. Inbox me the URL of the website you like.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you build e-commerce websites and shops?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do. I can create an e-commerce website and link it to PayPal or stripe or any other payment method.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my business website? Unfortunately, I have no programming skills.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can modify your website and add text & images to all pages with just a few clicks, as well as you can edit e-commerce products, images, descriptions, and pricing plans and add unlimited pages and posts, too, if you want.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my WordPress website be Mobile Friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, it'll be responsive for all devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my WordPress website be SEO Friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the basic structure of your website will be SEO Friendly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am confused or not sure which package suit my project.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No problem. Just drop me a message. I will provide Free Consultation Services for you.

openGraph.title: design and develop a modern website for your business

reviews.comment: Responsive and deliver as expected, as always. Recommended!

A great understanding of the details of the project and constant and seamless support make us order repetitively from this provider.
Communication is fluent and without any glitches. The job is getting done with a smooth workflow.
Highly recommended!

Overall, working with Mohammad was a positive experience, though there are a few areas that could be enhanced. Things started off smoothly, but towards the end, we did feel some pressure to finalize the project quickly, even with a few important tasks still pending. As new business owners, we took extra time to ensure everything met our expectations, and a bit more patience on his side would have been appreciated.

Mohammad was very responsive throughout, but we had hoped for more input on design and functionality. Since we were new to website development, we ended up relying heavily on our own ideas, providing most of the content, images, and layout suggestions.

He may be better suited to clients with more experience in website projects. That said, the final result was satisfactory, despite some minor challenges along the way, and we see room for future improvements. Thank you.
Best of the best! Thank you
